Claim: "Laura Bush is driving a jet-ski near the Washington monument."
Implication: "Laura Bush is not at the White House Conference on Global Literacy."
Referring expressions: Laura Bush, jet-ski, Washington monument.  Laura Bush, White House Conference on Global Literacy
Formula: (exists c (exists a (exists b (IsDriving(a) and IsNear(b) and IsAt(c))))) -> (exists a (exists d (IsNotAt(a) and IsAt(d))))
